alert.note: Alert for Attala; Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 7:06PM CDT until April 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Leake County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Attala County in central Mississippi... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 706 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Camden, or 11 miles west of Carthage, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Carthage and Thomastown around 715 PM CDT. Singleton around 725 PM CDT. Renfroe around 730 PM CDT. Smyrna around 735 PM CDT. Zama around 740 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Redwater. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
